        y - y location of the seat
        sideLength - the length of the seat(seat itself is a square)

      • seatClicked

        public boolean seatClicked(int mouseX,
                           int mouseY)
        Parameters:
        mouseX: - the x coordinate of where the mouse is clicked
        mouseY: - the y coordinate of where the mouse is clicked
        Returns:
        returns true if the mouse clicked is inside the specific seat or not
